extDescription.message: Brings features from WordPress.com to your browser.

badgeIssue.description: Used in the badge of the browser icon to indicate an issue that the user should resolve.

genericServerError.message: Unable to communicate with the WordPress.com servers.

loggedOutMessage.message: Sign in to your WordPress.com account to view your notifications, follow sites, and start new blog posts quickly and easily from your browser toolbar.

signUp.message: Don't have an account? It just takes a few seconds!
